aka: Tattooed on Our Eyes We Carry the Aftertaste

writer.name: 黛安娜·托塞多 Diana Toucedo

director.name: 黛安娜·托塞多 Diana Toucedo

this_title: Tatuado nos ollos levamos o pouso
trans_title: Tattooed on Our Eyes We Carry the Aftertaste
introduction: With great expressive freedom, Diana Toucedo transports us to a seaside village in Galicia. We are invited to observe the work of the women who collect shellfish, and hear from their own voices their relationship with their trade, the heritage of matriarchy and their sense of belonging. Sailors at sea complement this genuine and devoted community of workers.
foreign_title: Tatuado nos ollos levamos o pouso
